# coralogix_team (Data Source)

Coralogix Team.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) Team ID.

### Read-Only

- `daily_quota` (Number) Team quota. Optional, Default daily quota is 0.01 units/day.
- `name` (String) Team name.
- `retention` (Number) Team retention.
